mapper.select: select exam_room.* from exam_room,exam_location where exam_location.district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and exam_location.location_code = exam_room.location_code and exam_room.examroom_id not in ( select exam_assignment.examroom_id from exam_assignment,exam_room,exam_location where exam_location.district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and exam_location.location_code = exam_room.location_code and exam_room.examroom_id = exam_assignment.examroom_id and exam_assignment.exam_seq = #{examSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.insert: insert into exam_room (examroom_id, examroom_name, location_code, classroom_type, capability) values (#{examroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examroomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classroomType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{capability,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into exam_room
examroom_name,
location_code,
classroom_type,
capability,
#{examroomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{locationCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{classroomType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{capability,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update exam_room
examroom_name = #{examroomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_code = #{locationCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
classroom_type = #{classroomType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
capability = #{capability,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where examroom_id = #{examroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
